movies.Writer: Gabriela Larralde, Dominga Sotomayor, Alia Trabucco Zerán
movies.Actors: Benjamin Westfall, María Paz Grandjean, Ignacia Baeza

movies.title: The Only Girl in the Orchestra
movies.Plot: A celebration of trailblazing double bassist Orin O'Brien, the first woman to become a full-time member of the New York Philharmonic.
movies.Actors: Orin O'Brien, Manny Alvarez, Julian Barrera

movies.title: The Braid of Time
movies.Plot: Estela is a bright, 23-year-old Black Latina born and raised in Washington, D.C. She is busy DJing and building her own app when she is called to a magical journey of self-discovery by the spirit of her grandmother, Goya. With Goyita
movies.Actors: N/A

movies.title: Julia's Stepping Stones
movies.Plot: Julia Reichert, who passed away after a long battle with cancer in 2022, recounts the path she took to becoming an acclaimed filmmaker: her upbringing and education, and her interest in working people and the women's movement.
movies.Actors: Julia Reichert

movies.title: Morrison
movies.Plot: Jimmy, a 40-year-old ex-pop star turned engineer, returns to his childhood town to oversee renovating an old hotel. The once-glamorous hotel is now dilapidated, with narrow corridors reflecting its past under American occupation.
movies.Actors: Kitty Chicha, Joe Cummings, Hugo

movies.title: The Quilters
movies.Plot: In this short documentary, inmates at a maximum-security prison in Missouri sew custom quilts for children in the adoption waiting list.
movies.Actors: Joe Satterfield

movies.title: NOUVELLE VAGUE
movies.Plot: After writing for Cahiers du cinéma, young Godard decides making films is the best film criticism. He gets Beauregard to fund a low-budget feature, creating a treatment with Truffaut about a gangster couple.
movies.Writer: Holly Gent, Vincent Palmo Jr., Michèle Pétin
movies.Actors: Guillaume Marbeck, Zoey Deutch, Aubry Dullin

movies.title: Sew Torn
movies.Plot: A seamstress gets tangled in her own thread after stealing a briefcase from a drug deal gone bad. In an escalating game of cat and mouse, her different choices lead to drastically different outcomes along the way.
movies.Actors: Eve Connolly, Calum Worthy, John Lynch

movies.title: Ullozhukku
movies.Plot: A family's attempt to bury a loved one is thwarted by floodwaters, forcing them to confront long-buried secrets and lies that threaten their unity.
movies.Actors: Parvathy Thiruvothu, Urvashi, Arjun Radhakrishnan

movies.title: Paradise
movies.Plot: After his wife is forced to give up 40 years of her life as payment for an insurance debt, a man desperately searches for a way to get them back.
movies.Writer: Simon Amberger, Peter Kocyla, Boris Kunz

movies.title: Left-Handed Girl
movies.Plot: A single mother and her two daughters relocate to Taipei to open a night market stall, each navigating the challenges of adapting to their new environment while striving to maintain family unity.

movies.Country: Taiwan, France, United States, United Kingdom
